name: Openyabs
tagline: Yet another business software on github
body: openyabs - Yet another Business Software === **[Download installation packages here!](https://github.com/anti43/openyabs/releases)** **[Documentation starts here!](https://github.com/anti43/openyabs/wiki)** === If you have any question regarding Yabs, please write to the mailing list (english and german) openyabs@googlegroups.com Mailing list archive: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/openyabs Deutsche Beschreibung auf Heise: http://www.heise.de/download/yabs-yet-another-business-software-1149250.html Ubuntu Users: http://wiki.ubuntuusers.de/Yabs *** ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/anti43/openyabs/master/src/mpv5/resources/images/icon2_128.png)
